description:
Hi my friends! I know traveling can be a bit tired if you don't have a cozy room to get relaxed. Here at our house, you can feel like being home.

We have the best ever view of Manhattan; we have all basic furniture and ready for your come; we have an in-door poor and 24/7 gym you can use in your spare time; we have Court Sq station within 3 min walk, with 7, E, M, G available for anywhere you want to go.

Come to visit, and we'd like be hosting you and becoming your friends in NYC.
name: Cozy Shiny LIC Studio
review: The host canceled this reservation 64 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
